name: Mix and Split
description:
Mix and Split

Control a green and blue slime that can mix together to form a cyan slime. Solve puzzles by using each slimes abilities.

  • WAD - to move.
  • L  - Mix and Split
  • W+A/D - Walk walls
  • R - Restart

48 hour game made for #gmtk2021 with the theme joined together. 

Might be updated in the future for more levels and the extra 3 slimes I couldn’t add because of time
